Traits.Name: (Lurker) Camoflague
Traits.Content: When you are hidden, enemies cannot spot you with passive perception and they have disadvantage when making active checks to find you.

Traits.Name: (Lurker) Cunning Action
Traits.Content: You can Dash, Disengage, or Hide as a bonus action.

Traits.Name: (Lurker) Hide in Plain Sight
Traits.Content: You can attempt to hide when behind even light cover.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and poisoned.The lamprey tries to drag the creature into the wall.

Actions.Name: Blood Drain
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack :+5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the lamprey attaches to the target. While attached, it doesn't Attack. Instead, at the start of each of its turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) Hit Points due to blood loss. The lampreycan detach itself by spending 5 feet of its Movement. It does so after it drains 10 Hit Points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the lamprey.

Reactions.Name: Help Call
Reactions.Content: If the lamprey is detached, it calls for help, summoning 1 lamprey or 3 sludge worms.
